thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Revenue Group Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.14

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Revenue Group Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.14
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Rev Group Inc:
* REVENUE GROUP, INC. REPORTS FISCAL 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 SALES $2.4 BILLION TO $2.7 BILLION * ‍REAFFIRMS FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 OUTLOOK FOR NET SALES OF $2.4 TO $2.7 BILLION AND ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $200 TO $220 MILLION​
* ‍UPDATES FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 NET INCOME OUTLOOK TO A RANGE OF $90 TO $110 MILLION AND ADJUSTED NET INCOME TO A RANGE OF $110 TO $125 MILLION​
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.09, REVENUE VIEW $512.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $2.59 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
